Reference¶

Assignment¶

class ml4sec.Assignment(file_benign, file_unknown)[source]¶
Assignment.__init__(file_benign, file_unknown)[source]¶

ML4sec assignment. Acts as backend for the ML4sec assignment. We use this to abstract away some of the functionality to make the assignment less confusing for students.

Parameters

  • file_benign (string) – Path from which to load benign.csv.

  • file_unknown (string) – Path from which to load unknown.csv.

Note

We split methods provided for this assignment over different files that are imported by the Assignment class. Please view the separate files for the source code of all functions.

The assignment contains methods for each subsection of the assignment:

  • Load data
  • Extract features
  • Scale features
    • Visualisation
  • Kernel functions
    • Plotting
  • Split data
    • Test
  • Metrics
    • True/False Positive/Negatives
    • Test
    • Metric implementations
    • Results
  • Submit
